hypothesis_content.title: Liquidation Cascade Amplification Threshold
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC experiences >$400M in liquidations within 4 hours (like Dec 19 move), the next catalyst within 12 hours will trigger disproportionate follow-through: bullish catalysts amplified by 40% more than baseline, bearish catalysts by 25% more, due to cleared leverage creating cleaner price discovery.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Large liquidations remove over-leveraged positions, reducing forced selling pressure on subsequent moves. Market can respond more purely to fundamental catalysts. Recent $600M liquidation event provides immediate test case.
entry_conditions: Funding rates normalize to within 0.005% of neutral
Next scheduled catalyst occurs within 12 hours of liquidation event
Open interest declines by >5% from pre-liquidation levels

exit_conditions.take_profit: 1.4x (bullish) or 1.25x (bearish) of expected catalyst move based on 30D average

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Post-liquidation catalyst moves show no amplification vs 30D average OR show inverse relationship (dampened moves).
